description:
Emil is a member of the Royalty, elder brother to Hime. A youth with elegant looks who wears a decorative shirt. There is hostility between him and Hime, but he treasures their relationship and tries to keep it in balance. He can inflict a psychokinetic attack with just a glare, he is the only one that has this strange ability among the siblings of Royalty. In the manga, chapter 56, Emil eventually dies from his chronic illness, but not before allowing himself to die first from the mermaids aid and giving the mermaid to Sylvia. Emil than transforms into an "adult" but not technically, but more a flaming figure. He soons starts aiding his younger siblings, Hime and Sherwood. Before disappearing from Hime and Sherwood, he asks Sherwood to help Hime, and than tells Hime that she must inherit the throne, soon disappearing.
In the future, Emil had died from his chronic illness shortly after the bombing at Hime`s mansion and had entrusted the mermaid to Sylvia.
name: Emil
